message: on a django based app I set "[checkout_dir] directory_name" to the value "site" (as that'S my app dir). The app refused to start on ep.io ... however, when I set the value to something else  (a little less generic) it worked flawlessly
@nureineide You can't use "site", that's the name of a Python core module - either the core module or your site won't load :)
I'd suggest "website" or "app" as generic alternatives (if you don't need it to be a particular value, just leave that setting out, it defaults to 'app'.)
Stupid me. Thanks for pointing out :)
